1374: Gertrudis was born in Appel Marckt in 1374.
1387: Lost mother at the age of 13 in childbirth.
Became caretaker of Snelgerus, Oderada, Tielekine, Saxiardis at age 14.
1393: Lost sibling Eylwardo in 1393 when Eylwardo was 21.
1392: Got married to Gherelm at age 19 in 1392.
Had Gherelm move in at Appel Marckt.A.2 after marriage.
1394: Gave birth to Gherelm in 1394 at age 20.
1396: Lost daughter Ermegardis when Ermegardis was 0 years old.
Gave birth to stillborn Ermegardis in 1396 at age 22.
